problems.problem: Apple Watch app and phone app do not stay in sync (timers stop, logs not recorded, watch UI glitches)
example_reviews: the app on the watch and the app on the phone don’t seem to work in perfect synchronicity.
on my watch the timer randomly stops while on the phone it works fine... it won’t record it though i press the log button.

problems.problem: Workout generation gives odd or inconsistent weight/rep suggestions and repeats the same workouts / muscle groups
example_reviews: i’ve seen very strange weight/rep recommendations... i maxed out one exercise at 13 reps for 50 pounds. a couple days later the app wants me to do 15 reps for 40 pounds.
i continue to get the same workouts over and over despite marking muscle groups as not recovered... for a week straight the app tried to get me to do only legs.

problems.problem: Cannot add custom exercises or workouts; exercise library is missing specific types (e.g., kickboxing, some advanced lifts)
example_reviews: they don’t have as many different workouts as i like (for example, kickboxing and heavy bag workouts) and you don’t have the option of adding it.
please add the following exercises: pendlay rows, deficit deadlifts, halting deadlift, rack pulls, barbell overhead press...

problems.problem: Subscription pricing/affordability is a barrier for some users (annual or monthly cost complaints)
example_reviews: the $60 annual is a bit too much for me to justify at the moment
40$ a year is just not worth what i’m getting... i wish you wouldn’t force users to buy a subscription to use it.

problems.problem: Bugs and stability issues (inconsistent timers/beeps, occasional crashes, trial activation requires reinstall, adding exercises resets data)
example_reviews: when setting up the initial free 30 day trial, i had to install, delete, and reinstall the app three times before i was able to begin the free trial.
the timer beeps are inconsistent between sets... sometimes it’ll beep and other times it won’t.

problems.problem: Limited in-workout navigation and missing quick access to personal records (can't browse app while workout active)
example_reviews: once the work out is started you are not allowed to navigate the rest of the very limited app unless you end your work out.
there should be a tab or something to locate your personal records without having to individually look all of them up.

problems.problem: Superset pairing and advanced-lifter features are weak or inefficient (bad pairing, lack of superset control)
example_reviews: pair supersets in a way that is efficient. sometimes similar exercises are paired... they use the same piece of equipment that need rearranged.
after using the paid version... it’s quite useless for an advanced lifter... advance category needs the incorporation of supersets.

problems.problem: Requests for small personalization options (themes, alarm sounds, UI tweaks, less-promotional sharing)
example_reviews: more personalization ability for the user like... changing the color of the background, seasonal theming, or even... changing the sound of the alarms.
forcefully promoting your app when your trying to just show friends and family your workouts via the share button needs to be stopped.
